trans-unit.source: There is a significant downside to this approach. Statically compiled binaries are much larger than dynamically-linked binaries because they include everything they need to run. trans-unit.source: This can be used both to validate a prefix list given in a variable and to obtain the CIDR blocks (IP address ranges) for the associated AWS service. The latter may be useful e.g. for adding network ACL rules.

trans-unit.source: This can be used both to validate an availability zone given in a variable and to split the AZ name into its component parts of an AWS region and an AZ identifier letter. The latter may be useful e.g. for implementing a consistent subnet numbering scheme across several regions by mapping both the region and the subnet letter to network numbers.
trans-unit.target: 这既可以用来验证变量中给出的可用性区域,也可以将AZ名称分割成AWS区域和AZ标识符的组成部分。后者可能很有用,例如,通过将区域和子网字母映射到网络编号,在几个区域之间实施一致的子网编号方案。

trans-unit.source: This can be used for simple resource renaming, moving items to and from a module, moving entire modules, and more. And because this command can also move data to a completely new state, it can also be used for refactoring one configuration into multiple separately managed Terraform configurations.
trans-unit.target: 这可以用于简单的资源重命名,将项目移入或移出模块,移动整个模块等。而且由于这个命令也可以将数据移动到一个全新的状态,所以也可以用于将一个配置重构成多个单独管理的Terraform配置。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to initialize your cluster with system jobs, common services, and more. In day to day Nomad use it is common for developers to submit jobs to Nomad directly, such as for general app deployment. In addition to these apps, a Nomad cluster often runs core system services that are ideally setup during infrastructure creation. This resource is ideal for the latter type of job, but can be used to manage any job within Nomad.
trans-unit.target: 这可以用来初始化你的集群与系统作业、通用服务等。在日常的Nomad使用中,开发者直接向Nomad提交作业是很常见的,比如用于一般的应用部署。除了这些应用,Nomad集群还经常运行核心系统服务,这些服务最好在创建基础设施时设置。该资源是后一种类型作业的理想选择,但可以用于管理Nomad内的任何作业。

trans-unit.source: This command will not modify infrastructure, but does modify the state file in order to mark a resource as tainted. Once a resource is marked as tainted, the next plan will show that the resource will be destroyed and recreated and the next apply will implement this change.
trans-unit.target: 该命令不会修改基础结构，但是会修改状态文件，以将资源标记为已污染。将资源标记为已污染后，下一个计划将显示该资源将被销毁并重新创建，而下一个应用将实施此更改。

trans-unit.source: This command will not modify infrastructure, but does modify the state file in order to unmark a resource as tainted.
trans-unit.target: 此命令不会修改基础结构，但是会修改状态文件，以将资源取消标记为已污染。

trans-unit.source: This command does not check formatting (e.g. tabs vs spaces, newlines, comments etc.).
trans-unit.target: 该命令不检查格式（例如，制表符与空格，换行符，注释等）。

trans-unit.source: This command accepts all the arguments and flags that the apply command accepts, with the exception of a plan file argument.
trans-unit.target: 该命令接受apply命令接受的所有参数和标志，但计划文件参数除外。

trans-unit.source: This command flags that this object must be re-created in the next Terraform plan, so a subsequent terraform apply will then replace the deployment and thus activate the latest configuration changes.
trans-unit.target: 该命令标记必须在下一个Terraform计划中重新创建此对象，因此随后的Terraform terraform apply 将替换部署并因此激活最新的配置更改。

trans-unit.source: This command gives an overview of all of the current dependencies, as an aid to understanding why a particular provider is needed.
trans-unit.target: 该命令提供了所有当前依赖关系的概览,以帮助理解为什么需要某个特定的提供者。

trans-unit.source: This command is a container for further subcommands. These subcommands are listed in the navigation bar.
trans-unit.target: 该命令是其他子命令的容器。这些子命令列在导航栏中。

trans-unit.source: This command is a convenient way to check whether the execution plan for a set of changes matches your expectations without making any changes to real resources or to the state. For example, terraform plan might be run before committing a change to version control, to create confidence that it will behave as expected.
trans-unit.target: 此命令是检查一组更改的执行计划是否符合您的期望而不对实际资源或状态进行任何更改的便捷方法。例如，可以在对版本控制进行更改之前运行 terraform plan ，以建立对其预期行为的信心。

trans-unit.source: This command is a nested subcommand, meaning that it has further subcommands. These subcommands are listed to the left.
trans-unit.target: 该命令是一个嵌套子命令,意味着它还有其他子命令。这些子命令列在左边。

trans-unit.source: This command is always safe to run multiple times, to bring the working directory up to date with changes in the configuration. Though subsequent runs may give errors, this command will never delete your existing configuration or state.
trans-unit.target: 这个命令总是安全的,可以多次运行,使工作目录随着配置的变化而更新。虽然后续的运行可能会出错,但这个命令永远不会删除你现有的配置或状态。

trans-unit.source: This command locates the AWS instance with ID i-abcd1234 and attaches its existing settings, as described by the EC2 API, to the name aws_instance.example in the Terraform state.
trans-unit.target: 该命令查找ID为 i-abcd1234 的AWS实例，并将其现有设置（如EC2 API所述） aws_instance.example 到Terraform状态下的名称aws_instance.example中。

trans-unit.source: This command performs several different initialization steps in order to prepare a working directory for use. More details on these are in the sections below, but in most cases it is not necessary to worry about these individual steps.
trans-unit.target: 这条命令会执行几个不同的初始化步骤,以便为使用工作目录做准备。关于这些步骤的更多细节在下面的章节中,但在大多数情况下,没有必要担心这些单独的步骤。

trans-unit.source: This command requires a address that points to a single resource in the state. Addresses are in resource addressing format.
trans-unit.target: 该命令需要一个地址，该地址指向该状态下的单个资源。地址采用资源寻址格式。

trans-unit.source: This command requires a source and destination address of the item to move. Addresses are in resource addressing format.
trans-unit.target: 此命令需要移动项目的源和目标地址。地址采用资源寻址格式。

trans-unit.source: This command requires one or more addresses that point to a resources in the state. Addresses are in resource addressing format.
trans-unit.target: 此命令需要一个或多个指向状态中资源的地址。地址采用资源寻址格式。

trans-unit.source: This command should rarely be used. It is meant only as a utility in case manual intervention is necessary with the remote state.
trans-unit.target: 这个命令应该很少使用。它只是作为一个实用工具,在需要对远程状态进行手动干预时使用。

trans-unit.source: This command will create a new workspace with the given name. A workspace with this name must not already exist.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将以给定的名称创建一个新的工作区。此名称的工作区必须不存在。

trans-unit.source: This command will delete the specified workspace.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将删除指定的工作区。

trans-unit.source: This command will download any modules that haven't been updated already, as well as performing other Terraform working directory initialization such as installing providers.
trans-unit.target: 这条命令将下载所有尚未更新的模块,并执行其他Terraform工作目录的初始化,例如安装供应商。

trans-unit.source: This command will download the state from its current location and output the raw format to stdout.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将从当前位置下载状态,并以原始格式输出到stdout。

trans-unit.source: This command will move an item matched by the address given to the destination address. This command can also move to a destination address in a completely different state file.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将把与给定地址相匹配的项目移动到目的地址。该命令也可以移动到完全不同状态文件中的目的地址。

trans-unit.source: This command will output 5 values:
trans-unit.target: 该命令将输出5个值。

trans-unit.source: This command will output a backup copy of the state prior to saving any changes. The backup cannot be disabled. Due to the destructive nature of this command, backups are required.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将在保存任何更改之前输出状态的备份副本。该备份不能被禁用。由于该命令的破坏性,需要进行备份。

trans-unit.source: This command will push the state specified by PATH to the currently configured backend.
trans-unit.target: 此命令会将PATH指定的状态推送到当前配置的后端。

trans-unit.source: This command will select another workspace. The named workspace must already exist.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将选择另一个工作区。命名的工作区必须已经存在。

trans-unit.source: This config denies all traffic in the Default ACL. This can be useful if you want a locked down default to force all resources in the VPC to assign a non-default ACL.
trans-unit.target: 该配置拒绝默认ACL中的所有流量。如果你想锁定默认值,迫使VPC中的所有资源分配一个非默认的ACL,这个配置就很有用。

trans-unit.source: This config will write a single service unit (shown below) with the contents of an example service. This unit will be enabled as a dependency of multi-user.target and therefore start on boot
trans-unit.target: 这个配置将编写一个包含服务示例内容的服务单元(如下所示)。这个单元将作为multi-user.target的一个依赖项被启用,因此在启动时就会启动。

trans-unit.source: This data source allows to find a Hosted Zone ID given Hosted Zone name and certain search criteria.
trans-unit.target: 这个数据源可以查找给定的主机区名称和特定的搜索标准的主机区ID。

trans-unit.source: This data source allows you to use data encrypted with Google Cloud KMS within your resource definitions.
trans-unit.target: 此数据源允许您在您的资源定义中使用谷歌云KMS加密的数据。

trans-unit.source: This data source can be used to fetch information about a specific IAM group. By using this data source, you can reference IAM group properties without having to hard code ARNs as input.
trans-unit.target: 此数据源可用于获取特定IAM组的信息。通过使用该数据源,您可以引用IAM组的属性,而无需硬编码ARN作为输入。

trans-unit.source: This data source can be used to fetch information about a specific IAM instance profile. By using this data source, you can reference IAM instance profile properties without having to hard code ARNs as input.
trans-unit.target: 此数据源可用于获取特定IAM实例配置文件的信息。通过使用该数据源,您可以引用IAM实例配置文件属性,而无需硬编码ARN作为输入。

trans-unit.source: This data source can be used to fetch information about a specific IAM policy.
trans-unit.target: 这个数据源可以用来获取特定IAM策略的信息。

trans-unit.source: This data source can be used to fetch information about a specific IAM role. By using this data source, you can reference IAM role properties without having to hard code ARNs as input.
trans-unit.target: 这个数据源可以用来获取特定IAM角色的信息。通过使用该数据源,您可以引用IAM角色属性,而无需硬编码ARN作为输入。

trans-unit.source: This data source can be used to fetch information about a specific IAM user. By using this data source, you can reference IAM user properties without having to hard code ARNs or unique IDs as input.
trans-unit.target: 该数据源可用于获取特定IAM用户的信息。通过使用该数据源,您可以引用IAM用户属性,而无需硬编码ARN或唯一ID作为输入。

trans-unit.source: This data source can prove useful when a module accepts an LB Listener as an input variable and needs to know the LB it is attached to, or other information specific to the listener in question.
trans-unit.target: 当一个模块接受一个LB监听器作为输入变量,并且需要知道它所连接的LB,或者其他有关监听器的特定信息时,这个数据源可以证明是有用的。

trans-unit.source: This data source can prove useful when a module accepts an LB Target Group as an input variable and needs to know its attributes. It can also be used to get the ARN of an LB Target Group for use in other resources, given LB Target Group name.
trans-unit.target: 当一个模块接受一个LB目标组作为输入变量并需要知道它的属性时,这个数据源可以证明是有用的。它还可用于获取LB目标组的ARN,以便在其他资源中使用,给定LB目标组名称。

trans-unit.source: This data source can prove useful when a module accepts an LB as an input variable and needs to, for example, determine the security groups associated with it, etc.
trans-unit.target: 当一个模块接受一个LB作为输入变量,并需要例如确定与其相关联的安全组等时,这个数据源可以证明是有用的。

trans-unit.source: This data source fetches the project name, and provides the appropriate URLs to use for container registry for this project.
trans-unit.target: 这个数据源获取项目名称,并提供适当的URL用于这个项目的容器注册表。

trans-unit.source: This data source is different from the consul_service (singular) data source, which provides a detailed response about a specific Consul service.
trans-unit.target: 此数据源与 consul_service （单一）数据源不同，后者提供有关特定Consul服务的详细响应。

trans-unit.source: This data source is different from the consul_services (plural) data source, which provides a summary of the current Consul services.
trans-unit.target: 此数据源与 consul_services （多个）数据源不同，后者提供了当前Consul服务的摘要。

trans-unit.source: This data source is used to define IAM policies to apply to other resources. Currently, defining a policy through a datasource and referencing that policy from another resource is the only way to apply an IAM policy to a resource.
trans-unit.target: 此数据源用于定义IAM策略以应用于其他资源。目前,通过数据源定义策略并从另一个资源中引用该策略是将IAM策略应用于资源的唯一方法。

trans-unit.source: This data source provides information about Edge clusters configured in NSX. An Edge cluster is a collection of Edge nodes which can be deployed as either VM form-factor or bare-metal form-factor machines for connectivity between overlay logical switches and non-NSX underlay networking for north/south layer 2 or layer 3 connectivity. Each T0 router will be placed on one ore more Edge nodes in an Edge cluster therefore this data source is needed for the creation of T0 logical routers.
trans-unit.target: 该数据源提供了有关在 NSX 中配置的 Edge 集群的信息。边缘集群是边缘节点的集合,它可以部署为虚拟机形式或裸机形式的机器,用于覆盖逻辑交换机和非NSX底层网络之间的连接,以实现南北第2层或第3层的连接。每个T0路由器将被放置在一个边缘集群中的一个或多个边缘节点上,因此在创建T0逻辑路由器时需要这个数据源。

trans-unit.source: This data source provides information about Transport Zones (TZ) configured in NSX. A Transport Zone defines the scope to which a network can extend in NSX. For example an overlay based Transport Zone is associated with both hypervisors and logical switches and defines which hypervisors will be able to serve the defined logical switch. Virtual machines on the hypervisor associated with a Transport Zone can be attached to logical switches in that same Transport Zone.
trans-unit.target: 该数据源提供了有关在NSX中配置的传输区(TZ)的信息。传输区定义了网络在NSX中可以扩展的范围。例如,基于叠加的传输区同时与管理程序和逻辑交换机相关联,并定义了哪些管理程序将能够为定义的逻辑交换机提供服务。与传输区关联的管理程序上的虚拟机可以连接到同一传输区的逻辑交换机上。

trans-unit.source: This data source provides information about a network and security (NS) service configured in NSX. NS services are either factory defined in NSX or can be defined by the NSX administrator. They provide a convenience name for a port/protocol pair that is often used in fire walling or load balancing.
trans-unit.target: 此数据源提供有关在 NSX 中配置的网络和安全 (NS)服务的信息。NS服务可以在NSX中出厂定义,也可以由NSX管理员定义。它们为端口/协议对提供了一个方便的名称,通常用于防火墙或负载平衡。

trans-unit.source: This data source provides information about logical Tier 0 routers configured in NSX. A Tier 0 router is used to connect NSX networking with traditional physical networking. Tier 0 routers are placed on an Edge cluster and will exist on one or more Edge node depending on deployment settings (i.e. active/active or active/passive). A Tier 0 router forwards layer 3 IP packets and typically peers with a traditional physical router using BGP or can use static routing.
trans-unit.target: 该数据源提供了有关NSX中配置的逻辑Tier 0路由器的信息。Tier 0路由器用于连接NSX网络和传统物理网络。Tier 0路由器被放置在边缘集群上,并将根据部署设置(即主动/主动或主动/被动)存在一个或多个边缘节点上。Tier 0路由器转发第3层IP数据包,通常使用BGP与传统物理路由器对等,也可以使用静态路由。

trans-unit.source: This directory must already exist before Terraform will cache plugins; Terraform will not create the directory itself.
trans-unit.target: 在Terraform缓存插件之前,这个目录必须已经存在;Terraform不会自己创建这个目录。

trans-unit.source: This does not actually attach a volume to an instance. Please use the openstack_compute_volume_attach_v2 resource for that.
trans-unit.target: 这实际上并未将卷附加到实例。请 openstack_compute_volume_attach_v2 使用openstack_compute_volume_attach_v2资源。

trans-unit.source: This does not actually attach a volume to an instance. Please use the openstack_compute_volume_attach_v3 resource for that.
trans-unit.target: 这实际上并未将卷附加到实例。请 openstack_compute_volume_attach_v3 使用openstack_compute_volume_attach_v3资源。

trans-unit.source: This does not modify infrastructure, but does modify the state file. If the state is changed, this may cause changes to occur during the next plan or apply.
trans-unit.target: 这不会修改基础设施,但会修改状态文件。如果状态被改变,可能会导致在下一个计划或应用期间发生变化。

trans-unit.source: This endpoint allows searching modules.
trans-unit.target: 这个端点可以搜索模块。

trans-unit.source: This endpoint downloads the latest version of a module for a single provider.
trans-unit.target: 该端点为单个提供者下载模块的最新版本。

trans-unit.source: This endpoint downloads the specified version of a module for a single provider.
trans-unit.target: 该端点为单个提供者下载指定版本的模块。

trans-unit.source: This endpoint returns the latest version of a module for a single provider.
trans-unit.target: 该端点返回单个提供者的模块的最新版本。

trans-unit.source: This endpoint returns the latest version of each provider for a module.
trans-unit.target: 该端点返回模块的每个提供者的最新版本。

trans-unit.source: This endpoint returns the specified version of a module for a single provider.
trans-unit.target: 该端点返回单个提供者的模块的指定版本。

trans-unit.source: This establishes the main function to produce a valid, executable Go binary. The contents of the main function consume Terraform's plugin library. This library deals with all the communication between Terraform core and the plugin.
trans-unit.target: 这将建立主要功能，以产生有效的可执行Go二进制文件。主要功能的内容使用Terraform的 plugin 库。该库处理Terraform核心与插件之间的所有通信。

trans-unit.source: This example addons_config disables two addons:
trans-unit.target: 此示例 addons_config 禁用两个插件：

trans-unit.source: This example creates a custom attribute named terraform-test-attribute. The resulting custom attribute can be assigned to VMs only.
trans-unit.target: 本示例创建一个名为 terraform-test-attribute 的自定义属性。结果定制属性只能分配给VM。

trans-unit.source: This example creates a tag category named terraform-test-category, with single cardinality (meaning that only one tag in this category can be assigned to an object at any given time). Tags in this category can only be assigned to VMs and datastores.
trans-unit.target: 本示例创建一个名为 terraform-test-category 的标签类别，并且具有单一基数（这意味着在任何给定时间只能将该类别中的一个标签分配给一个对象）。此类别中的标签只能分配给VM和数据存储。

trans-unit.source: This example creates a tag named terraform-test-tag. This tag is assigned the terraform-test-category category, which was created by the vsphere_tag_category resource. The resulting tag can be assigned to VMs and datastores only, and can be the only value in the category that can be assigned, as per the restrictions defined by the category.
trans-unit.target: 本示例创建一个名为 terraform-test-tag 的标签。该标签分配了 terraform-test-category 类别，该类别由 vsphere_tag_category 资源创建。根据类别定义的限制，结果标签只能分配给VM和数据存储，并且可以是类别中可以分配的唯一值。

trans-unit.source: This example defines a local child module in the ./publish_bucket subdirectory. That module has configuration to create an S3 bucket. The module wraps the bucket and all the other implementation details required to configure a bucket.
trans-unit.target: 本示例在 ./publish_bucket 子目录中定义了本地子模块。该模块具有创建S3存储桶的配置。该模块包装存储桶以及配置存储桶所需的所有其他实现细节。

trans-unit.source: This example is the common case of creating a repository within Google Cloud Source Repositories:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子是在Google Cloud Source Repositories中创建存储库的常见情况。

trans-unit.source: This example sets the trunk mode VLAN (4095, which passes through all tags) and sets allow_promiscuous to ensure that all traffic is seen on the port. The latter setting overrides the implicit default of false set on the virtual switch.
trans-unit.target: 本示例设置中继模式VLAN（ 4095 ，它通过所有标记）并设置 allow_promiscuous 以确保在端口上可以看到所有流量。后面的设置将覆盖虚拟交换机上的 false 的隐式默认设置。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to customize the TLS settings of an HTTPS listener.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子展示了如何自定义HTTPS监听器的TLS设置。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to enable backend authentication for an ELB as well as customize the TLS settings.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子展示了如何启用ELB的后端认证以及自定义TLS设置。

trans-unit.source: This example will import an AWS instance:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子将导入一个AWS实例。

trans-unit.source: This example will list all resources, including modules:
trans-unit.target: 本例将列出所有资源,包括模块。

trans-unit.source: This example will only list resources for the given name:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子将只列出给定名称的资源。

trans-unit.source: This example will only list resources in the given module:
trans-unit.target: 本例只列出指定模块中的资源。

trans-unit.source: This example will only list the resource whose ID is specified on the command line. This is useful to find where in your configuration a specific resource is located.
trans-unit.target: 本例只列出在命令行中指定ID的资源。这对于查找特定资源在配置中的位置非常有用。

trans-unit.source: This example will only taint a resource within a module:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子只会污染一个模块内的资源。

trans-unit.source: This example will taint a single resource:
trans-unit.target: 本例将对单一资源进行污损。

trans-unit.source: This file allows you to define some variables that can be reused in multiple .tf files.
trans-unit.target: 这个文件允许你定义一些可以在多个.tf文件中重复使用的变量。

trans-unit.source: This file allows you to set some variables that can be reused in multiple .tf files.
trans-unit.target: 这个文件允许你设置一些可以在多个.tf文件中重复使用的变量。

trans-unit.source: This file will define the logical networking topology that Terraform will create in NSX.
trans-unit.target: 这个文件将定义Terraform将在NSX中创建的逻辑网络拓扑。

trans-unit.source: This group includes cloud providers offering a range of services including IaaS, SaaS, and PaaS offerings. This group of cloud providers includes some smaller scale clouds or ones with more specialized offerings. The Terraform provider and associated resources for these clouds are primarily supported by the cloud vendor in close collaboration with HashiCorp, and are tested by HashiCorp.
trans-unit.target: 这类云提供商包括提供IaaS、SaaS和PaaS产品等一系列服务的云提供商。这类云提供商包括一些规模较小的云或提供更专业服务的云。这些云的Terraform提供商和相关资源主要是由云供应商与HashiCorp密切合作支持的,并由HashiCorp进行测试。

trans-unit.source: This group includes hyper-scale cloud providers that offer a range of services including IaaS, SaaS, and PaaS. A large percentage of Terraform users provision their infrastructure on these major cloud providers. HashiCorp closely partners with these cloud providers to offer best-in-class integration to provision and manage the majority of the services offered. These providers are primarily supported by the cloud vendor in close collaboration with HashiCorp, and are tested by HashiCorp.
trans-unit.target: 这一组包括提供一系列服务的超大规模云提供商,包括IaaS、SaaS和PaaS。很大比例的Terraform用户在这些主要的云供应商上配置他们的基础设施。HashiCorp与这些云提供商紧密合作,提供一流的集成,以提供和管理大部分服务。这些供应商主要由云供应商与HashiCorp密切合作提供支持,并由HashiCorp进行测试。

trans-unit.target: 这是一个很好的方式,可以慢慢地将基础架构过渡到Terraform,或者说,如果Terraform有可能不支持你今天所需要的每一个功能,你可以放心地在未来使用Terraform。

trans-unit.source: This is a group of Version Control System (VCS) providers that offer capabilities of using Terraform to manage your VCS projects, teams and repositories. Terraform integrates with these services to create and manage resources provided by the VCS. These providers are primarily supported by the vendor in close collaboration with HashiCorp, and are tested by HashiCorp.
trans-unit.target: 这是一组版本控制系统(VCS)供应商,他们提供使用Terraform管理VCS项目、团队和存储库的能力。Terraform与这些服务集成,以创建和管理VCS提供的资源。这些供应商主要由供应商与HashiCorp密切合作提供支持,并由HashiCorp进行测试。

trans-unit.source: This is a group of database providers offer specific capabilities to provision and configure your database resources. Terraform integrates with with these database services using the specific provider to provision and manages database resources. These providers are primarily supported by the vendor in close collaboration with HashiCorp, and are tested by HashiCorp.
trans-unit.target: 这是一组数据库提供商,他们提供特定的功能来配置和配置你的数据库资源。Terraform与这些数据库服务集成,使用特定的供应商来配置和管理数据库资源。这些提供商主要是由厂商与HashiCorp密切合作支持的,并由HashiCorp进行测试。

trans-unit.source: This is a group of miscellaneous providers offer specific capabilities that can be useful when working with Terraform. These providers are primarily supported by the vendors and the Terraform community, and are tested by HashiCorp.
trans-unit.target: 这是一组提供特定功能的杂牌供应商,在使用Terraform时可能会有用。这些供应商主要由供应商和Terraform社区支持,并由HashiCorp测试。

trans-unit.source: This is a group of monitoring & system management providers that offer the capability to configure and manage services such as loggers, metric tools, and monitoring services. Terraform integrates with these services using the specific provider to enable these specialized monitoring capabilities. These providers are primarily supported by the vendor in close collaboration with HashiCorp, and are tested by HashiCorp.
trans-unit.target: 这是一组监视和系统管理提供程序，它们提供了配置和管理服务的功能，例如记录器，度量工具和监视服务。Terraform使用特定的提供程序与这些服务集成，以启用这些专门的监视功能。这些提供程序主要由供应商与HashiCorp密切合作提供支持，并经过HashiCorp的测试。

trans-unit.source: This is a group of network providers that offer specific network capabilities such and DNS, routing, and firewall configuration. The providers generally offer a cloud-based service and Terraform integrates with these services using the specific providers. These providers are primarily supported by the vendor in close collaboration with HashiCorp, and are tested by HashiCorp.
trans-unit.target: 这是一组网络供应商,他们提供特定的网络功能,如DNS、路由和防火墙配置。这些提供商一般提供基于云的服务,Terraform使用特定的提供商与这些服务进行集成。这些提供商主要由厂商与HashiCorp紧密合作提供支持,并由HashiCorp进行测试。

trans-unit.source: This is a group of software providers offering specialized infrastructure management capabilities such as configuration management. Terraform integrates with these tools using the specific providers to enable these specialized tools to execute tasks during the provisioning of infrastructure. These providers are primarily supported by the vendor in close collaboration with HashiCorp, and are tested by HashiCorp.
trans-unit.target: 这是一组软件供应商,提供专门的基础设施管理能力,如配置管理。Terraform使用特定的供应商与这些工具进行集成,使这些专业工具能够在基础设施的配置过程中执行任务。这些提供商主要由厂商与HashiCorp密切合作提供支持,并由HashiCorp进行测试。

trans-unit.source: This is a preferred approach over any other when running in EC2 as you can avoid hard coding credentials. Instead these are leased on-the-fly by Terraform which reduces the chance of leakage.
trans-unit.target: 当你在EC2中运行时,这是一种比其他任何方法都更可取的方法,因为你可以避免硬编码凭证。相反,这些证书是由Terraform即时租赁的,这减少了泄漏的机会。

trans-unit.source: This is a slightly-opinionated guide, which chooses to ignore the built-in versioning and staged deployment mechanisms in AWS Lambda and API Gateway. In many cases these features are not necessary when using Terraform because changes can be tracked and deployed by keeping the Terraform configuration in a version-control repository. It also uses API Gateway in a very simple way, proxying all requests to a single AWS Lambda function that is expected to contain its own request routing logic.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个略带观点的指南,它选择忽略AWS Lambda和API Gateway中内置的版本控制和分期部署机制。在很多情况下,在使用Terraform时,这些功能是不必要的,因为可以通过将Terraform配置保存在版本控制仓库中来跟踪和部署变化。它还以一种非常简单的方式使用API Gateway,将所有请求代理到一个AWS Lambda函数,预计该函数将包含自己的请求路由逻辑。

trans-unit.source: This makes it significantly easier to use Terraform as a team: team members modify the Terraform configurations locally and continue to use normal version control. When the Terraform configurations are ready to be run, they are pushed to Terraform Enterprise, and any member of your team can run Terraform with the push of a button.

trans-unit.source: This provider has the ability to log all HTTP requests and responses between Terraform and the OpenStack cloud which is useful for troubleshooting and debugging.
trans-unit.target: 该提供商能够记录Terraform和OpenStack云之间的所有HTTP请求和响应,这对故障排除和调试非常有用。

trans-unit.source: This provider has the ability to log all HTTP requests and responses between Terraform and the OpenTelekomCloud cloud which is useful for troubleshooting and debugging.
trans-unit.target: 该提供商能够记录Terraform和OpenTelekomCloud云之间的所有HTTP请求和响应,这对故障排除和调试非常有用。

trans-unit.target: 该提供商能够记录Terraform和TelefonicaOpenCloud云之间的所有HTTP请求和响应,这对故障排除和调试非常有用。

trans-unit.source: This provider is intended to be used for simple situations where you wish to integrate Terraform with a system for which a first-class provider doesn't exist. It is not as powerful as a first-class Terraform provider, so users of this interface should carefully consider the implications described on each of the child documentation pages (available from the navigation bar) for each type of object this provider supports.
trans-unit.target: 该提供者的目的是用于简单的情况,即您希望将Terraform与不存在一流提供者的系统集成。它不像一流的Terraform提供者那样强大,所以该接口的用户应该仔细考虑该提供者支持的每一种类型的对象在每个子文档页(可从导航栏获得)中描述的含义。

trans-unit.source: This provider is not particularly useful on its own, but it can be used to create certificates and credentials that can then be used with other providers when creating resources that expose TLS services or that themselves provision TLS certificates.
trans-unit.target: 这个提供者本身并不是特别有用,但它可以用来创建证书和凭证,然后在创建暴露TLS服务的资源或自己提供TLS证书的资源时,可以与其他提供者一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This provider requires no configuration. For information on the resources it provides, see the navigation bar.
trans-unit.target: 该提供商无需配置。有关其提供的资源的信息,请参见导航栏。

trans-unit.source: This provider serves two pretty-distinct use-cases, which each have their own security trade-offs and caveats that are covered in the sections that follow. Consider these carefully before using this provider within your Terraform configuration.
trans-unit.target: 该提供商服务于两种截然不同的使用情况,每种情况都有自己的安全权衡和注意事项,这些内容将在后面的章节中介绍。在您的Terraform配置中使用该提供者之前,请仔细考虑这些问题。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows the user to request for and claim to a persistent volume.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许用户申请并声称拥有一个永久卷。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you manage your repositories such as scm type, if it is private, how to fork the repository and other options.
trans-unit.target: 这个资源可以让你管理你的版本库,比如scm类型,是否是私有的,如何分叉版本库和其他选项。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add and remove dynamic address group tags.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加和删除动态地址组标签。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/remove collaborators from repositories in your organization. Collaborators can have explicit (and differing levels of) read, write, or administrator access to specific repositories in your organization, without giving the user full organization membership.
trans-unit.target: 此资源允许您从组织中的存储库中添加/删除合作者。合作者可以对组织中的特定存储库有明确的(和不同级别的)读、写或管理员访问权限,而无需给予用户完整的组织成员资格。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/remove repository deploy keys.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/删除版本库部署密钥。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/remove teams from your organization. When applied, a new team will be created. When destroyed, that team will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 此资源允许您从您的组织中添加/删除团队。当应用时,一个新的团队将被创建。销毁时,该团队将被删除。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/remove users from teams in your organization. When applied, the user will be added to the team. If the user hasn't accepted their invitation to the organization, they won't be part of the team until they do. When destroyed, the user will be removed from the team.
trans-unit.target: 此资源允许您从组织的团队中添加/删除用户。当应用时,用户将被添加到团队中。如果用户没有接受组织的邀请,他们将不会成为团队的一部分,直到他们接受邀请。当销毁时,该用户将从团队中删除。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/remove users from your organization. When applied, an invitation will be sent to the user to become part of the organization. When destroyed, either the invitation will be cancelled or the user will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 此资源允许您从组织中添加/删除用户。应用时,将向用户发出邀请,使其成为组织的一部分。销毁时,要么取消邀请,要么删除用户。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete NAT rules.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/更新/删除NAT规则。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete Panorama NAT rules.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/更新/删除 Panorama NAT 规则。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete Panorama address groups.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/更新/删除 Panorama 地址组。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete Panorama administrative tags.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/更新/删除Panorama管理标签。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete Panorama device groups.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/更新/删除Panorama设备组。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete Panorama security rule groups.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/更新/删除 Panorama 安全规则组。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete Panorama service groups.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/更新/删除Panorama服务组。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete Panorama service objects.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/更新/删除Panorama服务对象。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete a specific device in a Panorama device group.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/更新/删除 Panorama 设备组中的特定设备。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete address groups.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/更新/删除地址组。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete address objects on Panorama.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您在Panorama上添加/更新/删除地址对象。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete address objects.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/更新/删除地址对象。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete administrative tags.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/更新/删除管理标签。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete ethernet interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/更新/删除以太网接口。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete interface management profiles.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/更新/删除接口管理配置文件。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete security rule groups.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/更新/删除安全规则组。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete service groups.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/更新/删除服务组。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete service objects.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/更新/删除服务对象。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete telemetry sharing.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/更新/删除遥测共享。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete virtual routers.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您添加/更新/删除虚拟路由器。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to add/update/delete zones.
trans-unit.target: 此资源允许您添加/更新/删除区域。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to configure branch protection for repositories in your organization. When applied, the branch will be protected from forced pushes and deletion. Additional constraints, such as required status checks or restrictions on users and teams, can also be configured.
trans-unit.target: 此资源允许您为组织中的存储库配置分支保护。应用后,该分支将受到保护,不被强制推送和删除。还可以配置额外的限制,如所需的状态检查或对用户和团队的限制。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to create and manage GitLab groups. Note your provider will need to be configured with admin-level access for this resource to work.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您创建和管理 GitLab 组。需要注意的是,你的供应商需要配置管理员级别的权限才能使用该资源。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to create and manage GitLab users. Note your provider will need to be configured with admin-level access for this resource to work.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您创建和管理 GitLab 用户。需要注意的是,你的供应商需要配置管理员级别的权限才能使用这个资源。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to create and manage deploy keys for your GitLab projects.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您为GitLab项目创建和管理部署密钥。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to create and manage hooks for your GitLab projects. For further information on hooks, consult the gitlab documentation.
trans-unit.target: 此资源使您可以创建和管理GitLab项目的挂钩。有关钩子的更多信息，请参考gitlab文档。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to create and manage issue labels within your Github organization.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您在Github组织中创建和管理问题标签。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to create and manage labels for your GitLab projects. For further information on labels, consult the gitlab documentation.
trans-unit.target: 该资源使您可以为GitLab项目创建和管理标签。有关标签的更多信息，请参考gitlab文档。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to create and manage projects within your GitLab group or within your user.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您在GitLab组或用户中创建和管理项目。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to create and manage repositories within your Github organization.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您在Github组织内创建和管理仓库。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to create and manage webhooks for Github organization.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许你为Github组织创建和管理webhooks。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to create and manage webhooks for repositories within your Github organization.
trans-unit.target: 该资源允许您为Github组织内的仓库创建和管理webhooks。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to manage the full security posture.
trans-unit.target: 这个资源可以让你管理完整的安全态势。

trans-unit.source: This resource allows you to update the general device settings, such as DNS or the hostname.
trans-unit.target: 此资源允许您更新一般设备设置,如DNS或主机名。

trans-unit.source: This resource also allows the retrieval of an existing public key from the store, so that it may be used in the configuration of other resources such as aws_key_pair.
trans-unit.target: 此资源还允许从商店中检索现有的公共密钥，以便可以在其他资源（例如 aws_key_pair )的配置中使用它。

trans-unit.source: This resource also exports a full set of attributes corresponding to the arguments of the aws_ami resource, allowing the properties of the created AMI to be used elsewhere in the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此资源还会导出与 aws_ami 资源的参数相对应的完整属性集，从而允许在配置中的其他位置使用创建的AMI的属性。

trans-unit.source: This resource also exports a full set of attributes corresponding to the arguments of the aws_ami resource, allowing the properties of the created AMI to be used elsewhere in the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此资源还会导出与 aws_ami 资源的参数相对应的完整属性集，从而允许在配置中的其他位置使用创建的AMI的属性。

trans-unit.source: This resource also exposes the full set of arguments from the aws_ami resource.
trans-unit.target: 此资源还公开了 aws_ami 资源中的完整参数集。

trans-unit.source: This resource attaches a security group to an Elastic Network Interface (ENI). It can be used to attach a security group to any existing ENI, be it a secondary ENI or one attached as the primary interface on an instance.
trans-unit.target: 该资源将安全组附加到弹性网络接口(ENI)上。它可用于将安全组附加到任何现有的 ENI 上,无论是辅助 ENI 还是作为主接口附加到实例上的 ENI。

trans-unit.source: This resource can be imported by specifying all three arguments, separated by a forward slash:
trans-unit.target: 可以通过指定所有三个参数来导入该资源,这些参数之间用正斜线分隔。

trans-unit.source: This resource can be imported by specifying the zone ID and recordset ID, separated by a forward slash.
trans-unit.target: 该资源可以通过指定区域ID和记录集ID来导入,并以斜线分隔。

trans-unit.source: This resource can be imported by specifying the zone ID:
trans-unit.target: 该资源可以通过指定区号来导入。

trans-unit.source: This resource can be used in conjunction with resources that have the create_before_destroy lifecycle flag set, to avoid conflicts with unique names during the brief period where both the old and new resources exist concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 该资源可以与设置了 create_before_destroy 生命周期标志的资源一起使用，以避免在新旧资源同时存在的短暂时间内与唯一名称发生冲突。

trans-unit.source: This resource can be used in conjunction with resources that have, the create_before_destroy lifecycle flag set, to avoid conflicts with unique names during the brief period where both the old and new resources exist concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 该资源可以与设置了 create_before_destroy 生命周期标志的资源一起使用，以避免在新旧资源同时存在的短暂时间内与唯一名称发生冲突。

trans-unit.source: This resource can be used to configure a NSX DHCP relay profile on the NSX manager. A DHCP relay profile is a type of template that can be used to define a remote DHCP server where DHCP packets can be relayed for DHCP requests of machines attached to NSX logical topologies. The DHCP relay profile can be used in a DHCP relay service and later consumed by a router link port.
trans-unit.target: 此资源可用于在 NSX 管理器上配置 NSX DHCP 中继配置文件。DHCP 中继配置文件是一种模板,可用于定义远程 DHCP 服务器,在该服务器中,可以为连接到 NSX 逻辑拓扑的机器的 DHCP 请求中继 DHCP 数据包。DHCP中继配置文件可以在DHCP中继服务中使用,之后由路由器链路端口消耗。

trans-unit.source: This resource can be useful for getting back a list of VPC Ids for a region.
trans-unit.target: 此资源可用于获取一个区域的VPC Ids列表。

trans-unit.source: This resource can be useful for getting back a list of route table ids to be referenced elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 这个资源可以用来获取路由表id的列表,以便在其他地方引用。

trans-unit.source: This resource can be useful for getting back a list of subnet ids for a vpc.
trans-unit.target: 此资源可用于获取vpc的子网ID列表。

trans-unit.source: This resource can create both affinity rules, where virtual machines run on specified hosts, or anti-affinity rules, where virtual machines run on hosts outside of the ones specified in the rule. Virtual machines and hosts are supplied via groups, which can be managed via the vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_group and vsphere_compute_cluster_host_group resources.
trans-unit.target: 这种资源可以创建关联性规则，在虚拟机上指定的主机，或运行反关联性规则，在虚拟机上的规则中指定的万军之外运行。虚拟机和主机是通过组提供的，可以通过 vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_group 和 vsphere_compute_cluster_host_group 资源进行管理。

trans-unit.source: This resource can prove useful when a module accepts a Security Group id as an input variable and needs to, for example, determine the id of the VPC that the security group belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 当一个模块接受一个安全组id作为输入变量,并且需要,例如,确定安全组所属的VPC的id时,这个资源可以证明是有用的。

trans-unit.source: This resource can prove useful when a module accepts a Subnet id as an input variable and needs to, for example, add a route in the Route Table.
trans-unit.target: 当一个模块接受一个子网ID作为输入变量,并且需要在路由表中添加路由时,这个资源可以证明是有用的。

trans-unit.source: This resource can prove useful when a module accepts a subnet id as an input variable and needs to, for example, determine the id of the VPC that the subnet belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 当一个模块接受一个子网id作为输入变量,并且需要,例如,确定子网所属的VPC的id时,这个资源可以证明是有用的。

trans-unit.source: This resource can prove useful when a module accepts a vpc id as an input variable and needs to, for example, determine the CIDR block of that VPC.
trans-unit.target: 当一个模块接受一个vpc id作为输入变量,并且需要,例如,确定该VPC的CIDR块时,这个资源可以证明是有用的。

trans-unit.source: This resource can prove useful when a module accepts an allocation ID or public IP as an input variable and needs to determine the other.
trans-unit.target: 当一个模块接受一个分配ID或公共IP作为输入变量并需要确定另一个时,这个资源可以证明是有用的。

trans-unit.source: This resource can prove useful when finding the resource associated with a CIDR. For example, finding the peering connection associated with a CIDR value.
trans-unit.target: 在查找与CIDR相关联的资源时,该资源可以证明是有用的。例如,查找与CIDR值相关联的对等连接。

trans-unit.source: This resource cannot currently be used to manage personal repositories, outside of organizations.
trans-unit.target: 当前无法在组织外部使用此资源来管理个人存储库。

trans-unit.source: This resource cannot currently be used to manage webhooks for personal repositories, outside of organizations.
trans-unit.target: 该资源当前不能用于管理组织外部个人存储库的Webhooks 。

trans-unit.source: This resource considers its instances to have been deleted after either their validity periods ends or the early renewal period is reached. At this time, applying the Terraform configuration will cause a new certificate to be generated for the instance.
trans-unit.target: 该资源在其有效期结束或达到提前更新期后,认为其实例已被删除。此时,应用Terraform配置将导致为该实例生成新的证书。

trans-unit.source: This resource creates a Beanstalk Application Version that can be deployed to a Beanstalk Environment.
trans-unit.target: 该资源创建了一个可以部署到Beanstalk环境的Beanstalk应用版本。

trans-unit.source: This resource creates an application that has one configuration template named default, and no application versions
trans-unit.target: 此资源创建的应用程序具有一个名为 default 的配置模板，并且没有应用程序版本

trans-unit.source: This resource creates and rolls out a Cloud Endpoints service using OpenAPI or gRPC. View the relevant docs for OpenAPI and gRPC.
trans-unit.target: 此资源使用OpenAPI或gRPC创建并推出Cloud Endpoints服务。查看有关OpenAPI和gRPC的相关文档。

trans-unit.source: This resource creates objects within an existing data bag. To create the data bag itself, use the chef_data_bag resource.
trans-unit.target: 此资源在现有数据包中创建对象。要创建数据包本身，请使用 chef_data_bag 资源。

trans-unit.source: This resource creates the data bag itself. Inside each data bag is a collection of items which can be created using the chef_data_bag_item resource.
trans-unit.target: 此资源创建数据包本身。每个数据包中都有一些项目的集合，可以使用 chef_data_bag_item 资源创建这些项目。

trans-unit.source: This resource does not read the secret data back from Terraform on refresh by default. This avoids the need for read access on the given path, but it means that Terraform is not able to detect and repair "drift" on this resource should the data be updated or deleted outside of Terraform. This limitation can be negated by setting allow_read to true
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此资源不会在刷新时从Terraform 读回秘密数据。这避免了对给定路径的 read 访问的需要，但是这意味着如果在Terraform外部更新或删除数据，Terraform将无法检测和修复此资源上的“漂移”。可以通过将 allow_read 设置为true来消除此限制

trans-unit.source: This resource does not export any additional attributes.
trans-unit.target: 该资源不输出任何附加属性。

trans-unit.source: This resource does not support importing.
trans-unit.target: 此资源不支持导入。

trans-unit.source: This resource exports no further attributes.
trans-unit.target: 该资源没有进一步的属性输出。

trans-unit.source: This resource exports the following attributes:
trans-unit.target: 该资源输出的属性如下:

trans-unit.source: This resource has been updated to use the correct catalog APIs in place of service registration APIs. The consul_agent_service resource previously also used the service registration API designed for registration against an agent running on a local node. Because Terraform is intended to be run externally to the cluster, and for other internal reasons, this API was the incorrect one to use.
trans-unit.target: 此资源已更新，可以使用正确的目录API代替服务注册API。所述 consul_agent_service 资源也预先使用的服务注册API登记设计针对剂运行的本地节点上。由于Terraform打算在群集外部运行，并且由于其他内部原因，因此该API是不正确使用的API。

trans-unit.source: This resource has some overlap with the panos_panorama_device_group resource. If you want to use this resource with the other one, then make sure that your panos_panorama_device_group spec does not define any device blocks, and just stays as "computed".
trans-unit.target: 该资源与 panos_panorama_device_group 资源有些重叠。如果要与其他资源一起使用此资源，请确保您的 panos_panorama_device_group 规范未定义任何 device 块，而仅保持“已计算”状态。

trans-unit.source: This resource has some overlap with the panos_panorama_device_group_entry resource. If you want to use this resource with the other one, then make sure that your panos_panorama_device_group spec does not define any device blocks, and just stays as "computed".
trans-unit.target: 该资源与 panos_panorama_device_group_entry 资源有一些重叠。如果要与其他资源一起使用此资源，请确保您的 panos_panorama_device_group 规范未定义任何 device 块，而仅保持“已计算”状态。

trans-unit.source: This resource is best applied to an instance that is stopped when this instance is created, so that the contents of the created image are predictable. When applied to an instance that is running, the instance will be stopped before taking the snapshots and then started back up again, resulting in a period of downtime.
trans-unit.target: 最好将此资源应用于在创建该实例时停止的实例，以便可以预测所创建图像的内容。当将其应用于正在运行的实例时，该实例将在拍摄快照之前停止，然后再次启动，从而导致一段时间的停机时间。

trans-unit.source: This resource is experimental and may be removed in the future! Feedback is requested if you find this resource useful or if you find any problems with it.
trans-unit.target: 此资源是试验性的,将来可能会被删除! 如果您觉得这个资源有用,或者您发现任何问题,请提供反馈。

trans-unit.source: This resource is for additional certificates and does not replace the default certificate on the listener.
trans-unit.target: 该资源用于附加证书,并不取代监听器上的默认证书。

trans-unit.source: This resource is intended to be used in conjunction with a Terraform provider for a particular certificate authority in order to provision a new certificate. This is a logical resource, so it contributes only to the current Terraform state and does not create any external managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 该资源旨在与Terraform提供程序一起用于特定的证书颁发机构，以便提供新的证书。这是一个逻辑资源，因此它仅有助于当前Terraform状态，并且不会创建任何外部托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This resource is intended to be used in conjunction with a Terraform provider that has a resource that requires a TLS certificate, such as:
trans-unit.target: 该资源旨在与拥有需要TLS证书的资源的Terraform提供商一起使用,例如:

trans-unit.source: This resource is primarily intended to be used with Vault's "generic" secret backend, but it is also compatible with any other Vault endpoint that supports the vault read command.
trans-unit.target: 该资源主要旨在与Vault的“通用”秘密后端一起使用，但也与支持 vault read 命令的任何其他Vault端点兼容。

trans-unit.source: This resource is primarily intended to be used with Vault's "generic" secret backend, but it is also compatible with any other Vault endpoint that supports the vault write command to create and the vault delete command to delete.
trans-unit.target: 该资源主要旨在与Vault的“通用”秘密后端一起使用，但它也与任何其他支持创建 vault write 命令和 vault delete 命令的Vault端点兼容。

trans-unit.source: This resource is the actual Kubernetes master cluster. It can take a few minutes to provision in AWS.
trans-unit.target: 该资源是实际的Kubernetes主集群。它可以在AWS中花几分钟时间进行配置。

trans-unit.source: This resource is thus useful in the case where Terraform is exclusively managing a set of related keys.
trans-unit.target: 因此,该资源在Terraform专门管理一组相关密钥的情况下非常有用。

trans-unit.source: This resource just establishes ownership of and the TLS settings for a particular domain name. An API can be attached to a particular path under the registered domain name using the aws_api_gateway_base_path_mapping resource.
trans-unit.target: 此资源仅建立特定域名的所有权和TLS设置。一个API可以连接到使用已注册的域名下的特定路径的 aws_api_gateway_base_path_mapping 资源。

trans-unit.source: This resource mainly serves as an input to the vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_dependency_rule and vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_host_rule resources. See the individual resource documentation pages for more information.
trans-unit.target: 此资源主要用作 vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_dependency_rule 和 vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_host_rule 资源的输入。有关更多信息，请参见各个资源文档页面。

trans-unit.source: This resource mainly serves as an input to the vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_host_rule resource - see the documentation for that resource for further details on how to use host groups.
trans-unit.target: 此资源主要用作 vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_host_rule 资源的输入-有关如何使用主机组的更多详细信息，请参阅该资源的文档。

trans-unit.source: This resource manages clusters of security rules in a single device group, enforcing both the contents of individual rules as well as their ordering. Rules are defined in a rule config block.
trans-unit.target: 此资源管理单个设备组中的安全规则群集，从而强制执行各个规则的内容及其顺序。规则在 rule 配置块中定义。

trans-unit.source: This resource manages clusters of security rules in a single vsys, enforcing both the contents of individual rules as well as their ordering. Rules are defined in a rule config block.
trans-unit.target: 此资源在单个vsys中管理安全规则的群集，从而强制执行各个规则的内容及其顺序。规则在 rule 配置块中定义。

trans-unit.source: This resource manages individual keys, and thus it can create, update and delete the keys explicitly given. However, it is not able to detect and remove additional keys that have been added by non-Terraform means. To manage all keys sharing a common prefix, and thus have Terraform remove errant keys not present in the configuration, consider using the consul_key_prefix resource instead.
trans-unit.target: 该资源管理各个密钥，因此可以创建，更新和删除显式给出的密钥。但是，它无法检测和删除通过非Terraform方式添加的其他密钥。要管理共享公共前缀的所有密钥，从而使Terraform删除配置中不存在的错误密钥，请考虑改为使用 consul_key_prefix 资源。

trans-unit.source: This resource manages relationships between teams and repositories in your Github organization.
trans-unit.target: 这个资源可以管理Github组织中团队和仓库之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: This resource manages the full set of security rules in a vsys, enforcing both the contents of individual rules as well as their ordering. Rules are defined in a rule config block.
trans-unit.target: 此资源管理vsys中的完整安全规则集，从而强制执行各个规则的内容及其顺序。规则在 rule 配置块中定义。

trans-unit.source: This resource manages the full set of security rules, enforcing both the contents of individual rules as well as their ordering. Rules are defined in a rule config block. As this manages the full set of security rules for a given rulebase, any extraneous rules are removed on terraform apply.
trans-unit.target: 此资源管理完整的安全规则集，从而强制执行各个规则的内容及其顺序。规则在 rule 配置块中定义。由于这可以管理给定规则库的完整安全规则集，因此会在 terraform apply 上删除所有无关的规则。

trans-unit.source: This resource manages the lifecycle of a Docker service. By default, the creation, update and delete of services are detached.
trans-unit.target: 该资源管理Docker服务的生命周期。默认情况下,服务的创建、更新和删除是分离的。

trans-unit.source: This resource may prove useful when setting up a Route53 record, or an origin for a CloudFront Distribution.
trans-unit.target: 在设置Route53记录或CloudFront分发的原点时,此资源可能会证明是有用的。

trans-unit.source: This resource only exports the id attribute for the vSphere custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此资源仅导出vSphere自定义属性的 id 属性。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides a alarm rule resource and it can be used to monitor several cloud services according different metrics. Details for alarm rule.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了警报规则资源，可用于根据不同指标监视多个云服务。警报规则的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides a means to configure a NAT rule in NSX. NAT provides network address translation between one IP address space and another IP address space. NAT rules can be destination NAT or source NAT rules.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了在NSX中配置NAT规则的方法。NAT提供一个IP地址空间和另一个IP地址空间之间的网络地址转换。NAT规则可以是目标NAT规则或源NAT规则。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides a means to configure static routes in NSX to determine where IP traffic is routed.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了在NSX中配置静态路由的方法,以确定IP流量的路由位置。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides a means to configure tags that are applied to objects such as virtual machines. A virtual machine is not directly managed by NSX however, NSX allows attachment of tags to a virtual machine. This tagging enables tag based grouping of objects. Deletion of nsxt_vm_tags resource will remove all tags from the virtual machine and is equivalent to update operation with empty tag set.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了一种配置应用于虚拟机等对象的标签的方法。NSX并不直接管理虚拟机，但是NSX允许将标签附加到虚拟机。该标记实现了基于标记的对象分组。删除 nsxt_vm_tags 资源将删除虚拟机中的所有标签，这等效于设置了空标签的更新操作。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides a means to define a downlink port on a logical router to connect a logical router to a logical switch. The result of this is to provide a default gateway to virtual machines running on the logical switch.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了在逻辑路由器上定义一个下行端口的方法,以将逻辑路由器连接到逻辑交换机。这样做的结果是为运行在逻辑交换机上的虚拟机提供一个默认网关。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides a method for the management of a tier 1 logical router. A tier 1 logical router is often used for tenants, users and applications. There can be many tier 1 logical routers connected to a common tier 0 provider router.
trans-unit.target: 本资源提供了1级逻辑路由器的管理方法。第1层逻辑路由器通常用于租户、用户和应用。可以有许多层级1逻辑路由器连接到一个共同的层级0提供商路由器。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides a method to create a logical switch in NSX. Virtual machines can then be connected to the appropriate logical switch for the desired topology and network connectivity.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了在NSX中创建逻辑交换机的方法。然后,可以将虚拟机连接到所需拓扑和网络连接的适当逻辑交换机。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides a method to create and manage a network and security (NS) group in NSX. A NS group is used to group other objects into collections for application of other settings.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了在NSX中创建和管理网络和安全(NS)组的方法。NS组用于将其他对象分组为集合,以便应用其他设置。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides a resource to configure a logical port on a logical switch in the NSX system. Like physical switches a logical switch can have one or more ports which can be connected to virtual machines or logical routers.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了在NSX系统的逻辑交换机上配置逻辑端口的资源。与物理交换机一样,逻辑交换机可以有一个或多个端口,可以连接到虚拟机或逻辑路由器。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides a way to configure a firewall section on the NSX manager. A firewall section is a collection of firewall rules that are grouped together.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了在NSX管理器上配置防火墙部分的方法。防火墙部分是一组防火墙规则的集合,它们被分组在一起。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides a way to configure a networking and security service which can be used with the NSX firewall. A networking and security service is an object that contains the TCP/UDP algorithm, source ports and destination ports in a single entity.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了一种配置网络和安全服务的方法,该服务可以与NSX防火墙一起使用。网络和安全服务是一个对象,它在一个实体中包含TCP/UDP算法、源端口和目的端口。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides a way to configure a networking and security service which can be used within NSX. This specific service is for configuration of layer 4 ports.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了一种配置网络和安全服务的方法,可以在NSX中使用。该特定服务用于配置第4层端口。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides a way to configure a networking and security service which can be used within NSX. This specific service is for the ICMP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了配置可在NSX内使用的网络和安全服务的方法。这个特定的服务是针对ICMP协议的。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides a way to configure a networking and security service which can be used within NSX. This specific service is for the IGMP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了配置可在NSX内使用的网络和安全服务的方法。这个特定的服务是针对IGMP协议的。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides a way to configure a networking and security service which can be used within NSX. This specific service is for the IP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了配置可在NSX内使用的网络和安全服务的方法。该特定服务是针对IP协议的。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides a way to configure a networking and security service which can be used within NSX. This specific service is for the layer 2 Ethernet protocol.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了一种配置可在NSX内使用的网络和安全服务的方法。该特定服务是针对第2层以太网协议的。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides a way to configure the DHCP relay service on the NSX manager. The DHCP relay service uses a DHCP relay profile and later consumed by a router link port to provide DHCP addresses to virtual machines connected to a logical switch.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了在NSX管理器上配置DHCP中继服务的方法。DHCP中继服务使用DHCP中继配置文件,之后由路由器链路端口消耗,为连接到逻辑交换机的虚拟机提供DHCP地址。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides the ability to configure a logical router link port on a tier 0 logical router. This port can then be used to connect the tier 0 logical router to another logical router.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了在第0层逻辑路由器上配置逻辑路由器链路端口的功能。此端口可用于将第0层逻辑路由器连接到另一个逻辑路由器。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides the ability to configure a logical router link port on a tier 1 logical router. This port can then be used to connect the tier 1 logical router to another logical router.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了在第1层逻辑路由器上配置逻辑路由器链路端口的功能。此端口可用于将第1层逻辑路由器连接到另一个逻辑路由器。

trans-unit.source: This resource provides the following Timeouts configuration options:
trans-unit.target: 此资源提供以下“ 超时”配置选项：

trans-unit.source: This resource represents a successful validation of an ACM certificate in concert with other resources.
trans-unit.target: 该资源代表着ACM证书与其他资源一致的成功验证。

trans-unit.source: This resource sets the AWS public key and the type of document that can be verified against the key that Vault can then use to verify the instance identity documents making auth requests.
trans-unit.target: 该资源设置了AWS公钥和可以根据该公钥进行验证的文档类型,Vault可以使用该公钥来验证发出auth请求的实例身份文档。

trans-unit.source: This resource sets the access key and secret key that Vault will use when making API requests on behalf of an AWS Auth Backend. It can also be used to override the URLs Vault uses when making those API requests.
trans-unit.target: 该资源设置了Vault代表AWS Auth后端发出API请求时将使用的访问密钥和秘钥。它还可用于覆盖Vault在发出这些API请求时使用的URL。

trans-unit.source: This resource treats its inline rules as absolute; only the rules defined inline are created, and any additions/removals external to this resource will result in diff shown. For these reasons, this resource is incompatible with the aws_security_group_rule resource.
trans-unit.target: 该资源将其内联规则视为绝对规则。仅创建内联定义的规则，并且此资源外部的任何添加/删除都将导致显示差异。由于这些原因，该资源与 aws_security_group_rule 资源不兼容。

trans-unit.source: This resource treats its inline rules as absolute; only the rules defined inline are created, and any additions/removals external to this resource will result in diffs being shown. For these reasons, this resource is incompatible with the aws_network_acl_rule resource.
trans-unit.target: 该资源将其内联规则视为绝对规则。仅创建内联定义的规则，并且此资源外部的任何添加/删除都将导致显示差异。由于这些原因，该资源与 aws_network_acl_rule 资源不兼容。

trans-unit.source: This resource use an orchestration template to define and deploy a multi-container application. An application is created by using an orchestration template. Each application can contain one or more services.
trans-unit.target: 该资源使用编排模板来定义和部署一个多容器应用程序。应用程序是通过使用编排模板创建的。每个应用程序可以包含一个或多个服务。

trans-unit.source: This resource will not pull new layers of the image automatically unless used in conjunction with docker_registry_image data source to update the pull_triggers field.
trans-unit.target: 除非与 docker_registry_image 数据源结合使用以更新 pull_triggers 字段，否则该资源不会自动提取图像的新层。

trans-unit.source: This resource will create an operational server. After this section completes, the provisioner can be called.
trans-unit.target: 该资源将创建一个可运行的服务器。本节完成后,可以调用供应器。

trans-unit.source: This resource will first check if the label exists, and then issue an update, otherwise it will create.
trans-unit.target: 该资源将首先检查标签是否存在,然后发出更新,否则将创建。

trans-unit.source: This resource will help you to manager a Kubernetes Cluster. The cluster is same as container service created by web console.
trans-unit.target: 这个资源将帮助你管理一个Kubernetes集群。该集群与web控制台创建的容器服务相同。

trans-unit.source: This resource will help you to manager a Swarm Cluster.
trans-unit.target: 此资源将帮助您管理Swarm Cluster。

trans-unit.source: This resources provides a way to configure an IP set in NSX. An IP set is a collection of IP addresses. It is often used in the configuration of the NSX firewall.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了在NSX中配置IP集的方法。IP集是一个IP地址的集合。它经常用于配置NSX防火墙。

trans-unit.source: This rule can be used to tell a set to virtual machines to run on different datastores within a cluster, useful for preventing single points of failure in application cluster scenarios. When configured, Storage DRS will make a best effort to ensure that the virtual machines run on different datastores, or prevent any operation that would keep that from happening, depending on the value of the mandatory flag.
trans-unit.target: 此规则可用于告知一组虚拟机在群集内的不同数据存储上运行，这对于防止应用程序群集方案中的单点故障很有用。配置完后，Storage DRS将尽最大努力确保虚拟机在不同的数据存储上运行，或防止任何阻止该操作发生的操作，具体取决于 mandatory 标志的值。

trans-unit.source: This rule can be used to tell a set to virtual machines to run on different hosts within a cluster, useful for preventing single points of failure in application cluster scenarios. When configured, DRS will make a best effort to ensure that the virtual machines run on different hosts, or prevent any operation that would keep that from happening, depending on the value of the mandatory flag.
trans-unit.target: 此规则可用于告知一组虚拟机在群集内的不同主机上运行，​​对于防止应用程序群集方案中的单点故障很有用。配置后，DRS将尽最大努力确保虚拟机在不同的主机上运行，​​或防止任何阻止该操作发生的操作，具体取决于 mandatory 标志的值。

trans-unit.source: This rule can be used to tell a set to virtual machines to run together on a single host within a cluster. When configured, DRS will make a best effort to ensure that the virtual machines run on the same host, or prevent any operation that would keep that from happening, depending on the value of the mandatory flag.
trans-unit.target: 此规则可用于告知一组虚拟机在群集内的单个主机上一起运行。配置完成后，DRS将尽最大努力确保虚拟机在同一主机上运行，​​或防止任何阻止虚拟机发生的操作（取决于 mandatory 标志的值）。

trans-unit.source: This section covers the internals of Terraform and explains how plans are generated, the lifecycle of a provider, etc. The goal of this section is to remove any notion of "magic" from Terraform. We want you to be able to trust and understand what Terraform is doing to function.
trans-unit.target: 本节介绍了Terraform的内部结构,并解释了计划是如何生成的,提供者的生命周期等。本节的目标是消除Terraform中任何 "魔法 "的概念。我们希望你能够信任并理解Terraform的功能。

trans-unit.source: This section documents the various backend types supported by Terraform. If you're not familiar with backends, please read the sections about backends first.
trans-unit.target: 本节介绍了Terraform支持的各种后端类型。如果您不熟悉后端，请先阅读有关后端的部分。

trans-unit.source: This section documents the various backend types supported by Terraform. If you're not familiar with backends, please read the sections about backends first.
trans-unit.target: 本节介绍了Terraform支持的各种后端类型。如果您不熟悉后端，请先阅读有关后端的部分。

trans-unit.source: This section of the documentation gives a high-level overview of how to write plugins for Terraform. It does not hold your hand through the process, however, and expects a relatively high level of understanding of Go, provider semantics, Unix, etc.
trans-unit.target: 本节文档提供了如何为Terraform编写插件的高级概述。不过,它并不会牵着你的手走完整个过程,而是希望你对Go、provider语义、Unix等有比较高的理解。

trans-unit.source: This security group controls networking access to the Kubernetes masters. We will later configure this with an ingress rule to allow traffic from the worker nodes.
trans-unit.target: 这个安全组控制对Kubernetes主站的网络访问。我们稍后会用一个入口规则来配置,以允许来自工人节点的流量。

trans-unit.source: This security group controls networking access to the Kubernetes worker nodes.
trans-unit.target: 该安全组控制对Kubernetes工作节点的网络访问。

trans-unit.source: This setting is a repeatable block, where the block label is a hostname (either app.terraform.io or the hostname of your private install) and the block body contains a token attribute. Whenever Terraform requests module data from that hostname, it will authenticate with that token.
trans-unit.target: 此设置是可重复的块，其中块标签为主机名（ app.terraform.io 或您的私人安装的主机名），并且块主体包含 token 属性。每当Terraform从该主机名请求模块数据时，它将使用该令牌进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This setup will ensure that the HTTPS Load Balancer stack is not created before the Let's Encrypt's certificate is actually present in Rancher's certificates manager.
trans-unit.target: 此设置将确保在Let's Encrypt的证书实际存在于Rancher的证书管理器之前,不会创建HTTPS负载平衡器栈。

trans-unit.source: This setup will ensure that the Load Balancer stack is not created before the Let's Encrypt's certificate is actually present in Rancher's certificates manager.
trans-unit.target: 这种设置将确保在Let's Encrypt的证书实际存在于Rancher的证书管理器之前,不会创建负载平衡器栈。

trans-unit.source: This snippet creates a customized IAM organization role.
trans-unit.target: 这个片段创建了一个自定义的IAM组织角色。

trans-unit.source: This snippet creates a customized IAM role.
trans-unit.target: 这个片段创建了一个自定义的IAM角色。

trans-unit.source: This snippet creates a service account, then gives it objectViewer permission in a project.
trans-unit.target: 这段代码创建了一个服务账户,然后在项目中赋予它objectViewer权限。

trans-unit.source: This special argument applies to all providers. terraform providers can be used to view the specified version constraints for all providers used in the current configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此特殊参数适用于所有提供程序。 terraform providers 可用于查看当前配置中使用的所有提供程序的指定版本约束。

trans-unit.source: This special mode of operation supports two use-cases:
trans-unit.target: 这种特殊的操作模式支持两种使用情况。

trans-unit.source: This specifies where the log should persist its output to. Note that even when TF_LOG_PATH is set, TF_LOG must be set in order for any logging to be enabled. For example, to always write the log to the directory you're currently running terraform from:
trans-unit.target: 这指定了日志应将其输出保存到的位置。需要注意的是，即使 TF_LOG_PATH 设置， TF_LOG 必须为了任何日志记录设置为启用。例如，要始终将日志写入当前正在从以下目录运行terraform的目录中：

trans-unit.source: This state is stored by default in a local file named "terraform.tfstate", but it can also be stored remotely, which works better in a team environment.
trans-unit.target: 这个状态默认存储在一个名为 "terraform.tfstate "的本地文件中,但它也可以远程存储,这在团队环境中效果更好。

trans-unit.source: This targeting capability is provided for exceptional circumstances, such as recovering from mistakes or working around Terraform limitations. It is not recommended to use -target for routine operations, since this can lead to undetected configuration drift and confusion about how the true state of resources relates to configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此定位功能是在特殊情况下提供的，例如从错误中恢复或解决Terraform限制。这是不推荐使用 -target 用于常规操作，因为这可能会导致漏检配置偏差和混乱有关资源的真实状况如何与配置。

trans-unit.source: This template/solution are released under an as-is, best effort, support policy. These scripts should be seen as community supported and Palo Alto Networks will contribute our expertise as and when possible. We do not provide technical support or help in using or troubleshooting the components of the project through our normal support options such as Palo Alto Networks support teams, or ASC (Authorized Support Centers) partners and backline support options. The underlying product used (the VM-Series firewall) by the scripts or templates are still supported, but the support is only for the product functionality and not for help in deploying or using the template or script itself. Unless explicitly tagged, all projects or work posted in our GitHub repository (at https://github.com/PaloAltoNetworks) or sites other than our official Downloads page on https://support.paloaltonetworks.com are provided under the best effort policy.
trans-unit.target: 此模板/解决方案是按原样，尽力而为，支持策略发布的。这些脚本应视为社区支持的，并且Palo Alto Networks将在可能的情况下贡献我们的专业知识。我们不会通过常规支持选项（例如Palo Alto Networks支持团队或ASC（授权支持中心）合作伙伴和后勤支持选项）为使用或对项目组件进行故障排除提供技术支持或帮助。仍支持脚本或模板使用的基础产品（VM系列防火墙），但是该支持仅针对产品功能，而不是对部署或使用模板或脚本本身的帮助。除非明确标记，否则所有项目或工作都将发布在我们的GitHub存储库中（位于https://github.com/PaloAltoNetworks）或https://support.paloaltonetworks.com上我们官方下载页面以外的网站是根据“尽力而为”政策提供的。

trans-unit.source: This uses the schema.Resource type. This structure defines the data schema and CRUD operations for the resource. Defining these properties are the only required thing to create a resource.
trans-unit.target: 这使用 schema.Resource 类型。此结构定义了资源的数据模式和CRUD操作。定义这些属性是创建资源的唯一必需的事情。

trans-unit.source: This uses the schema.ResourceData API to get the value of "address" provided by the user in the Terraform configuration. Due to the way Go works, we have to typecast it to string. This is a safe operation, however, since our schema guarantees it will be a string type.
trans-unit.target: 这使用 schema.ResourceData API 来获取用户在Terraform配置中提供的 "address" 的值。由于Go的工作方式，我们必须将其类型转换为字符串。但是，这是安全的操作，因为我们的架构保证它将是字符串类型。

trans-unit.source: This validates Terraform is correctly delegating work to our plugin and that our validation is working as intended. Fix the validation error by adding an address field to the resource:
trans-unit.target: 这可以验证Terraform是否已将工作正确委派给我们的插件，并且我们的验证是否按预期进行。通过将 address 字段添加到资源来修复验证错误：

trans-unit.source: This will create a container called terraform-state and an object within that container called tfstate.tf.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个名为 terraform-state 的容器，并在该容器内创建一个名为 tfstate.tf 的对象。

trans-unit.source: This will create a required variable, memory, and then an output, received, that will be the value of the memory variable.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个必需的变量 memory ，然后创建一个 received 输出，该输出将是 memory 变量的值。

trans-unit.source: This will not modify your infrastructure. This command removes the lock on the state for the current configuration. The behavior of this lock is dependent on the backend being used. Local state files cannot be unlocked by another process.
trans-unit.target: 这不会修改您的基础设施。该命令将删除当前配置的状态锁。这个锁的行为取决于所使用的后端。本地状态文件不能被其他进程解锁。

trans-unit.source: This will not recreate the resource if the S3 object changes in some way. It's only used to initialize the database
trans-unit.target: 如果S3对象以某种方式发生变化,这将不会重新创建资源。它只用于初始化数据库。

trans-unit.source: This will not recreate the resource if the S3 object changes in some way. It's only used to initialize the database. This only works currently with the aurora engine. See AWS for currently supported engines and options. See Aurora S3 Migration Docs.
trans-unit.target: 如果S3对象以某种方式更改，则不会重新创建资源。它仅用于初始化数据库。目前仅适用于aurora引擎。有关当前支持的引擎和选项，请参见AWS。请参阅Aurora S3迁移文档。

trans-unit.source: To persist logged output you can set TF_LOG_PATH in order to force the log to always be appended to a specific file when logging is enabled. Note that even when TF_LOG_PATH is set, TF_LOG must be set in order for any logging to be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 要保留日志记录的输出，可以设置 TF_LOG_PATH ，以便在启用日志记录时强制将日志始终附加到特定文件。需要注意的是，即使 TF_LOG_PATH 设置， TF_LOG 必须为了任何日志记录设置为启用。

trans-unit.source: To protect you, the force-unlock command requires a unique lock ID. Terraform will output this lock ID if unlocking fails. This lock ID acts as a nonce, ensuring that locks and unlocks target the correct lock.
trans-unit.target: 为了保护您， force-unlock 命令需要唯一的锁定ID。如果解锁失败，Terraform将输出此锁定ID。此锁ID用作随机数，确保锁定和解锁目标为正确的锁。

trans-unit.source: To reduce the exposure of such secrets, the provider requests a Vault token with a relatively-short TTL (20 minutes, by default) which in turn means that where possible Vault will revoke any issued credentials after that time, but in particular it is unable to retract any static secrets such as those stored in Vault's "generic" secret backend.
trans-unit.target: 为了减少此类秘密的暴露,提供商要求Vault令牌具有相对较短的TTL(默认情况下为20分钟),这反过来又意味着在可能的情况下,Vault将在该时间之后撤销任何已发布的凭证,但特别是它无法收回任何静态秘密,例如存储在Vault的 "通用 "秘密后端的秘密。

trans-unit.source: To reference a particular instance of a resource you can use resource.foo.*.id[#] where # is the index number of the instance.
trans-unit.target: 要引用资源的特定实例，可以使用 resource.foo.*.id[#] ，其中 # 是实例的索引号。

trans-unit.source: To update a config, Terraform will destroy the existing resource and create a replacement. To effectively use a docker_config resource with a docker_service resource, it's recommended to specify create_before_destroy in a lifecycle block. Provide a uniqie name attribute, for example with one of the interpolation functions uuid or timestamp as shown in the example below. The reason is moby-35803.
trans-unit.target: 要更新 config ，Terraform将销毁现有资源并创建替代资源。为了有效地使用 docker_config 与资源 docker_service 资源，建议指定 create_before_destroy 在 lifecycle 块。提供uniqie name 属性，例如，使用插值函数 uuid 或 timestamp ，如下例所示。原因是moby-35803。

trans-unit.source: To update a secret, Terraform will destroy the existing resource and create a replacement. To effectively use a docker_secret resource with a docker_service resource, it's recommended to specify create_before_destroy in a lifecycle block. Provide a unique name attribute, for example with one of the interpolation functions uuid or timestamp as shown in the example below. The reason is moby-35803.
trans-unit.target: 要更新 secret ，Terraform将破坏现有资源并创建替代资源。为了有效地使用 docker_secret 与资源 docker_service 资源，建议指定 create_before_destroy 在 lifecycle 块。提供唯一的 name 属性，例如，使用插值函数 uuid 或 timestamp 之一，如下面的示例所示。原因是moby-35803。

trans-unit.source: Unconstrained randomness within a Terraform configuration would not be very useful, since Terraform's goal is to converge on a fixed configuration by applying a diff. Because of this, the "random" provider provides an idea of managed randomness: it provides resources that generate random values during their creation and then hold those values steady until the inputs are changed.
trans-unit.target: Terraform配置中不受约束的随机性不是很有用，因为Terraform的目标是通过应用diff收敛于固定配置。因此，“随机”提供程序提供了一种管理随机性的思想：它提供了在创建过程中会生成随机值，然后保持这些值稳定直到输入被更改的资源。

trans-unit.source: Unlike other RDS resources that support replication, with Amazon Aurora you do not designate a primary and subsequent replicas. Instead, you simply add RDS Instances and Aurora manages the replication. You can use the count meta-parameter to make multiple instances and join them all to the same RDS Cluster, or you may specify different Cluster Instance resources with various instance_class sizes.
trans-unit.target: 与其他支持复制的RDS资源不同，使用Amazon Aurora，您无需指定主副本和后续副本。相反，您只需添加RDS实例，Aurora即可管理复制。您可以使用count元参数来创建多个实例，并将它们全部加入同一RDS群集，也可以使用各种 instance_class 大小指定不同的Cluster Instance资源。

trans-unit.source: Unlike other resources in the "random" provider, this resource does use a cryptographic random number generator in order to minimize the chance of collisions, making the results of this resource when a 32-byte identifier is requested of equivalent uniqueness to a type-4 UUID.
trans-unit.target: 与“随机”提供程序中的其他资源不同，此资源的确使用了密码随机数生成器，以最大程度地减少冲突的机会，当请求一个32字节的标识符具有与Type-4等效的唯一性时，使该资源的结果UUID。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the vSphere client, many resources in the vSphere Terraform provider take Managed Object IDs (or UUIDs when provided and practical) when referring to placement parameters and upstream resources. This provides a stable interface for providing necessary data to downstream resources, in addition to minimizing the bugs that can arise from the flexibility in how an individual object's name or inventory path can be supplied.
trans-unit.target: 与 vSphere 客户端不同,vSphere Terraform 提供商中的许多资源在引用放置参数和上游资源时,都会采取托管对象 ID(或提供且实用时的 UUID)。这为向下游资源提供必要的数据提供了一个稳定的接口,此外还最大限度地减少了因如何灵活提供单个对象的名称或库存路径而可能产生的错误。

trans-unit.source: Updates to destination parameters such as datacenter, datastore, or destination_file will move the managed file a new destination based on the values of the new settings. If any source parameter is changed, such as source_datastore, source_datacenter or source_file), the resource will be re-created. Depending on if destination parameters are being changed as well, this may result in the destination file either being overwritten or deleted at the old location.
trans-unit.target: 对目标参数（例如 datacenter ， datastore 或 destination_file )的更新将根据新设置的值将托管文件移动到新的目标。如果更改了任何源参数，例如 source_datastore ， source_datacenter 或 source_file ），将重新创建资源。根据目标参数是否也被更改，这可能导致目标文件在旧位置被覆盖或删除。

trans-unit.source: Use a combination of snapshot_account and snapshot arguments. snapshot_account is in the format of: /Compute-mydomain/cloud_storage, and snapshot is a concatenated name of the original storage volume name, and it's child snapshot name: mystorage/mysnapshot.

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get the ARN of a certificate in AWS Certificate Manager (ACM). The process of requesting and verifying a certificate in ACM requires some manual steps, which means that Terraform cannot automate the creation of ACM certificates. But using this data source, you can reference them by domain without having to hard code the ARNs as input.

You will also need to make some adjustments to this approach to account for existing practices within your organization, if for example other tools have previously been used to manage infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 将本节用作您的方法的起点，但是请注意，您可能需要针对适用于您的组织的独特标准和法规进行调整。如果例如以前使用其他工具来管理基础结构，则您还需要对该方法进行一些调整，以考虑组织中的现有实践。

trans-unit.source: Used to represent an ordered collection of items, where the order the items are presented can impact the behavior of the resource being modeled. An example of ordered items would be network routing rules, where rules are examined in the order they are given until a match is found. The items are all of the same type defined by the Elem property.
trans-unit.target: 用于表示项目的有序集合，其中项目的显示顺序可能会影响正在建模的资源的行为。排序项目的一个示例是网络路由规则，其中按给出的顺序检查规则，直到找到匹配项。这些项目都是 Elem 属性定义的相同类型。

trans-unit.source: Values are assigned with the syntax of key = value (whitespace doesn't matter). The value can be any primitive (string, number, boolean), a list, or a map.
trans-unit.target: 值使用 key = value 的语法分配（空格无关紧要）。该值可以是任何原语（字符串，数字，布尔值），列表或映射。

trans-unit.source: Values for configuration_id and os_type are specific to each datacenter and are available via the API endpoints here.
trans-unit.target: configuration_id 和 os_type 的值特定于每个数据中心，可通过此处的API端点使用。

trans-unit.source: Values for the input variables of a root module can be gathered in variable definition files and passed together using the -var-file=FILE option.
trans-unit.target: 可以在变量定义文件中收集根模块的输入变量的值，并使用 -var-file=FILE 选项将其传递在一起。

trans-unit.source: Values passed within definition files or with -var will take precedence over TF_VAR_ environment variables, as environment variables are considered defaults.
trans-unit.target: 在定义文件中或使用 -var 传递的值将优先于 TF_VAR_ 环境变量，因为环境变量被视为默认值。

trans-unit.source: Variables files use HCL or JSON syntax to define variable values. Strings, lists or maps may be set in the same manner as the default value in a variable block in Terraform configuration. For example:
trans-unit.target: 变量文件使用HCL或JSON语法定义变量值。可以使用与Terraform配置中 variable 块中默认值相同的方式来设置字符串，列表或映射。例如：

trans-unit.source: Variables specified via the -var command line flag will be literal strings "true" and "false", so care should be taken to explicitly use "0" or "1".
trans-unit.target: 通过 -var 命令行标志指定的变量将是文字字符串“ true”和“ false”，因此应注意显式使用“ 0”或“ 1”。

trans-unit.source: Variables specified with the TF_VAR_ environment variables will be literal string values, just like -var.
trans-unit.target: 用 TF_VAR_ 环境变量指定的变量将是文字字符串值，就像 -var 一样。

trans-unit.source: Variables with boolean values in a tfvars file will likewise be converted to "0" and "1" values.
trans-unit.target: tfvars 文件中具有布尔值的变量将同样转换为“ 0”和“ 1”值。

trans-unit.target: 经过验证的模块由HashiCorp审查,并由贡献者积极维护,以保持与Terraform及其各自供应商的最新和兼容。

trans-unit.source: Version Control Providers
trans-unit.target: 版本控制供应商

trans-unit.source: Version constraints are supported only for modules installed from a module registry, such as the Terraform Registry or Terraform Enterprise's private module registry. Other module sources can provide their own versioning mechanisms within the source string itself, or might not support versions at all. In particular, modules sourced from local file paths do not support version; since they're loaded from the same source repository, they always share the same version as their caller.
trans-unit.target: 仅从模块注册表（例如Terraform注册表或Terraform Enterprise的私有模块注册表）安装的模块才支持版本限制。其他模块源可以在源字符串本身中提供自己的版本控制机制，或者可能根本不支持版本。特别是，从本地文件路径获取的模块不支持 version ；由于它们是从相同的源存储库加载的，因此它们始终与调用者共享相同的版本。
